transcript:
Customer: Hello, hello.
Executive: Haan, bolunga sir.
Customer: Haan, yes sir. [inaudible] problem kehte rahe sir, aashkon.
Executive: Haan, suniye sir, yes sir.
Customer: Haan, sir, nammadu like leads andha alavukku namakku generate aagura maari irukku. Enakku edhume leads set aagala. Edhaachu keywords maatha mudiyumaa? Keywords ellam brand name pottu irukku nu ninaikkiren. Brand name eduthuttu like goat milk body wash, documentation andha maari ellam panna mudiyumgala? Illa innaikku.
Executive: Haan, change pannalam sir. Products change pannalam ungalukku. Adhu vena update pannalama sir? Naan ungalukku sollattumaa? Ippo enna keywords irukku sir? Enga paakanum? Ippo engalukku enna dhaan keywords koduthu irukkeenga current aa?
Customer: Neenga ippo system la irukkeengala? Illa ippo mobile la paathuttu irukkeengala?
Executive: System la dhaan irukken.
Customer: Laptop la irukken sir. Products nu irukkum paarunga sir. Left hand side la dashboard, profile irukkum. Lead manager, buyleads, products irukkum.
Customer: Products poitten. Products la poitten.
Executive: Haan, unga keywords andhi paathukkoonga.
Customer: Haan, product name mention aayirukkum paarunga sir. Idhu dhaan customer ku show aaga koodiyadhu.
Customer: 18 globe goat milk body wash dhaan keywords koduthu irukkaangala?
Executive: Haan, primary products 18 globe instant glow cream, 18 globe, johncy milk face wash. Illa sir, naan kekkattum. Keywords enna koduthu irukkeenga nu kekkiren. Keywords enna koduthu irukkeenga?
Executive: Adhula vandhu categories mention aayirukku paarunga sir. Face cream, face wash, skin care cosmetics, hair growth oil.
Customer: Haan, shampoo. [inaudible] cosmetics.
Executive: Categories. Ippo andha 18 globe instant glow cream nu irukkingala? Adhula category mention aayirukku paarunga sir.
Customer: Irukkaanga sir?
Executive: Product la categories nu mention aayirukku paarunga sir. Product listing poitten. Okay. Products la categories nu enga irukku? Hair products irukku. Quick quick hair irukku. Search menu.
Customer: Sir, sir, adhu vandhu paatheenga na neenga okay adhu vandhu new aa add pannaradhukkaaga neenga paakkuradha option add product ellam. But naan ungalukku vandhuttu neenga category dhaan kekkureenga. Andha oru oru primary products leeyum anga vandhu mention aayirukkum paarunga. Adhoda keywords category.
Customer: Aama body washes nu pottu irukkeenga. Adhu idhu category sir neenga solradhu. Naan kekkuradhu keywords like idhu pottaale enakkum show aaguradhukkaaga kekkuren.
Executive: Sir, ippo ungalukku nu thaniyaa eppidi neenga idhu idhula mention aayirukkaa? Idhu dhaan ungaloda product. Adhula irukkuradhu category. Neenga keywords nu eppidi neenga mention pannareenga nu theriyala. IndiaMART eppidi work aagum nu ketteenga na product name sir. Okay ngala? Andha keyword pottu adhu adha dhaan naama vandhu keyword nu solluvaam. Andha keyword pottu search pannaraanga appidi na automatic aa adhu ungaloda catalog la irukku. So ungalodadhu vandhu andha visible aagudhu. Ungalukkum andha lead vandhu kaattum.
Customer: Okay. But enakku adhaavadhu leads eh kaattala endradhu dhaan sir complaint. Leads eh varala enakku. Okay. Naan mattha leads ellam use panni call pannalum illa sir naan vera type ke kelvi vendaam appindradhu maari cut pannaraanga.
Executive: Okay sir. Podhuvaaga general. [inaudible] body wash. See, ippo manually search pannteengala sir ungaloda need irukka product ku appidi dhaan search panni paatheengala? Illa adhula randomly vandhu irukkura leads neenga paathuttu irukkeengala?
Customer: Sir, buyleads ponaale enakku first of all like general aana audience kooda kidaikka maatteengaraanga. Avanga particular mention panni dhaan kekkuraanga. Sir, particular mention pannaravanga kaaga naama influence panni namma brand. Aama particular aa mention pannalume neenga avangala koopittu nammaloda product ku pathi avangakitta pesalaam. Pesalaam avangakitta. Adhoda benefits avangakitta sollalaam. Irukkuradhukkaachu call panni pesalaam na adhu dhaan sir engalukku adhu dhaan vendum. Naanga andha maari dhaan mention panni kekkurom illaiyaa appindradhu maari cut pannaraanga. Illa sir namma nallaa irukkom appidi na irukkuradhu sir naanga ippo leads appidi dhaan vendum dhaan requirement tharuvaam appindradhu maari solraanga. Sari general aa irukkuradhu leads enakku romba kammiyaa dhaan kidaikkudhu. Onnu kidaikkudhu adhigapatcham paarthu oru naal 15 naalukku onnu andha maari dhaan. Adhuleeyum avanga use pannaradhilla. Phone edukkalai illa not interested appindradhu maari solli vachidaraanga.
Executive: Sari sir. Neenga oru lead vandhuttuna maximum oru half an hour kulla andha lead vandhu reach pannunga sir. Okay ngala? Appidi irukkura leads edunga. Plus avanga. Appa pottadhu instant aave naan oru lead eduthu pesuren. Avanga appave illa enakku interest illai nu dhaan solraanga.
Customer: Okay. One second sir. Sir, naan ippo system la direct aa ungalukku connect pannaren. Ungalukku link share pannaren. Adhula neenga join pannunga. Ore nimisham irunga.
Executive: Haan, share pannunga.

Executive: Haan, sir neenga check panni paarunga sir.
Customer: Indha vandha sir neenga indha link open.

Executive: Koduthuttaan paarunga sir.
Customer: Okay sir. Sari ippo adhula neenga join aagunga. Naanum adhula ippo connect aaguren.
Executive: Haan, connect aagidhu sir.
Executive: Okay, okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not generating enough leads.

- Wants to change keywords.

- General audience leads not available.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to change the product keywords.

- Executive shared a link to join the system.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join the link shared by executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, keywords, product listing, leads
